messages.content:
Come up with a quote suitable for an Instagram post for an account with this description: {{2.Description}}

This is to be included as text on an image post, so it is very important that you:
Do not use include any hashtags
Do not use any emojis
Do not include speechmarks
Do not include anything other than the raw text of the quote

spec.help: Airtable will download the file at the given url and keep its own copy of it.
spec.name: url
spec.label: File URL

spec.help: If empty, Airtable will generate the name automatically.
spec.name: filename
spec.label: File name
